roleset.name: to draw attention away from something

example.name: all arguments
example.text: `` It 's distracting attention from serious issues , like how [*] to make DEA , FBI and Customs work together '' on drug enforcement [*T*-1] .

example.name: passive
example.text: Troubled chains could see their sales drop as much as 8 % , he believes [0] [*T*-1] , as managers distracted [*] by fears about the future allow their stores to get sloppy .
